text: Likhoeli tsa bosepeleli li’a tsebahala, haeba hona le ea ba tlang ho phethisa bosepeleli nakong eo, a hopole hore leetong le joalo ha ho hlokahale bobe, kapa bona bokhopo, kapa hona ho phehisana likhang. Botle bohle boo le bo etsang Ruri Allah U bo tsebile. Ka hona iketsetseng mofao; empa mofao o molemo ke boits’oaro bo botle. Lona batho ba kutloisiso hlokomelang ts’ebeletso ea lona ho ‘Na
